expected: no arguments              prints module list from git work directory and exits
<git-commit>              prints module list for given commit and exits
--show-sep [<git-commit>] prints module name separator from either workdir or commit
--add <name> <dir>        adds a directory filter to a new or existing module
--remove <name> <dir>     removes a directory filter from given module
--remove-all <name>       removes all filters from the module, effectively removing it
